November 29, 1957
Mr. Forrest N. Morgan, Jr.
315 Broadway
Methuen
Massachusetts
Dear Mr. Morgan:
Thank you for your letter of November 2 • I am very sorry for
the delay in answering it, but because yo^taent it to New York there
was a delay in its reaching us.
I have enclosed a s||aple of our NAEB TV Research Ffct Sheets
and also an Index. Our Fact Sheets are priced at 104 each or $2~;5 0 for
all those issued during a year. We can supply you with back issues
for the years 1955, 1956 and, of course, 1957. A complete set costs
therefore, $7.50. As of January, 1958 the Fact Sheets will be incorporated
into the NAEB Journal, and will no longer be mimeographed. The sub¬
scription price at that time will be $4.00 per year.
The Fact Sheets are an effort to digest and centralize available
research principally on the effectiveness of radio and television as
instructional tools. The Sheets are issued as a continuing series and
at irregular Intervals.
If you desire more information, please let us know.
Sincerely,
(Mrs.) Judith B. Gans
Secretary
